title: Kenda adds Rush, Karma 2 XC tires, plus tons more sizes for gravel, MTB & kids!
content:
Aimed at cross country and light trail riders looking for fast rolling but grippy treads, the new Kenda Rush and updated Karma 2 tires also get a new, lighter version of their SCT casing. There are also a LOT of new sizes of their Booster, Regolith, and HellKat tires, both for full sized bikes and

The post Kenda adds Rush, Karma 2 XC tires, plus tons more sizes for gravel, MTB & kids! appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
